Continuous Integration - PROBE Mpamain memory leak qmpa protosHealth - protocol health - WARNING Source IP of 1st Leg differs to Source IP Address in Message pane of eoF browsing for one FID is getting stuck "x selfmon" creates more output than expected when scrambling is enabled 29 Signalling Probes crashed - shutdown by watchdog Probe restarted - Error: e->m_eventType == sLUP_EVENT::ePDU qmpa5 not restarted after core dump caused by disk io errors RTP stat not correlated when using probe indexes x command does not show/work the Cellid and PagingInfo options Restarts observed for protocol UMTS_IU-14.0.0 UMTS_IU protocol server restart - GetNextCSDR failed Raw data capturing may fail on booster configuration
Protocols â€“ 64bit architecture migration Selfmon - SIM health CRITICAL (Selfmon evaluation of SIM health â€“ instance names condition corrected) qmpa protosHealth - protocol health - WARNING (CPU and memory process lifetime average returned by ps replaced with short average returned by top) Uninstall script doesn't match MC-7.1 rules (Fix for uninstall scripts that were outdated.) CSDR update reconnecting to probe is not happening properly (Introduced with EPR 34279 fix) Error Activating Maintenance Scan and Automatic update using Clasic topology (Fixed in new versions) Data lost which seems to be correlated with Nagios NRPE checks (Selfmon evaluation of link-set names was re-implemented to not retrieve CSLinksets output repeatedly.)
Paging in GB â€“ GB distribution (Parallel setting for GB protocol on links with key server configured now distributes GB traffic based on session IMSI tracking to protocol servers.) C++ gcc v4.8 (The build environment and compiler is changed. The 64bit qmpa5 binaries are built now with gcc 4.8.) nin file contains index with same name but different definition (Qmpa5 must support indexes with same name if they belong to different CSDR layouts.) wrong IMSI assigned (Part of deciphering and GB update fixes. TLLI is used with RAI as unique search key in qmpa5, in specific cases BVCI is used.) Gb deciphering - connections on different BVCI confusing IOVUI (Part of deciphering and GB update fixes. TLLI is used with RAI as unique search key in qmpa5, in specific cases BVCI is used.) IMSI is not filled in some cases (Part of deciphering and GB update fixes. TLLI is used with RAI as unique search key in qmpa5, in specific cases BVCI is used.) gb deciphering values fluctuating (Part of deciphering and GB update fixes. TLLI is used with RAI as unique search key in qmpa5, in specific cases BVCI is used.) incorrect IMEISV filling on IuPS (Part of deciphering and GB update fixes. TLLI is used with RAI as unique search key in qmpa5, in specific cases BVCI is used) Low Gb deciphering ratio (Part of deciphering and GB update fixes. TLLI is used with RAI as unique search key in qmpa5, in specific cases BVCI is used.)
security â€“ NTP alarm DNS tolerant - needed for LDAP (DNS is needed even on probes for planned LDAP introduction.) Inconsistent IMSI filling in S1 CSDRs (Observed problem was caused by info-server, but a bug in qmpa5 re-syncing after request timeouts could cause loss of more updates than those timeout-ed by fault of info-server.)
